1.content:
It's a hot summer day.You are sitting on a bench in Juliette's garden. Your beautiful girlfriend is by your side and you're chatting with her. Juliette is wearing a short-sleeved t-shirt and short panties and she's barefoot, so you can delight yourself watching her nice slender feet.
After a few minutes, Juliette says: "I'm thirsty... I'll go to take a drink." She gets up and walks towards her house's front door and meanwhile you contemplate her gorgeous bare feet while they softly crush the grass.
While you're waiting, you suddenly feel a little strange... then you notice that you're shrinking! You don't know why this is happening, but you do know this is really happening!
When you're about 1cm tall, you stop shrinking and you notice that the grass is now higher than you...

11133.content:
Your heart is pounding! Moments ago you were about to be lunch for a spider. Then the intense view of your girlfriend about to squash the both of you was almost your end. Somehow, you managed to leap and scramble up between your girlfriends toes. Beneath her enormous sole is the crushed remains of your enemy.

Juliette doesn't think twice about the spider she just stepped on. After all, she's always out here, barefoot and crushing bugs in her garden. It's just yet another one, trampled into the dirt by her. She spins, and sits down on the bench. Taking a long sip of her lemonade, she looks around. Where have you gone?

Slowly crawling, you start realizing what it's like to be a bug. On your girlfriend's beautiful skin, you're a pest. At least you'd be seen as one if she felt you moving around. But what else could you do? On the ground you'd be at risk of being beneath those feet.

As the moments drag on with you not deciding what else to do, Juliette decides for you. Her other foot raises. For a brief time, you're lost staring at the soft, slender sole of the woman you love. Her toes wiggle ever so slightly and cascades of dry dirt fall free from her skin. Instinctively you duck down, pressing your body flat to the top of her foot.

Then, her toes point down toward you and the truth becomes obvious. She's about to rub her foot on the one you're on! Juliette's smooth sole drops from above and presses you down. By some miracle it's soft enough to just press the air out of your lungs. It's hot and humid beneath her foot too. The heavy weight upon your body also makes it hard to breathe. But then, she moves her gigantic sole back and forth. Rubbing you against the top of her foot.

Exhausted and wishing she'd just let up, you can't help but admire the scent. It's a welcoming smell. Pleasant, even though it's from your girlfriend's sweaty feet. They're still crushing you though!

As her foot raises for a moment, cool air rushes in around you. If you're going to escape, now is the time.

The ant hill must've been a good four hundred feet away, but you knew that soon enough that some of the ants would go in your direction and attack you. The best option at this point would be to run, despite being incredibly tired.

1121.content:
With your heart pounding, you turn around and run toward the house. The stone path that leads from the bench seems like the easiest route. However, it's also where Juliette is walking back with a glass of lemonade.

The view is stunning. At your size, Juliette towers far above you. Looking back toward the grass beneath the bench, you see a few ants still milling about. One stops suddenly and seems to perk up. Waving it's antenna in the air, it's contemplating something. A moment later it looks in your direction.

Between the pounding, enormous feet of your girlfriend heading your way, and an ant that has just taken notice of you for whatever reason, you're trapped. Sure, you could trust Juliette, if you could get her attention. She might just think you're a bug too. Which of course, you'd be stepped on by those pretty feet you love so much.

Another option would be to just run into the grass at the side of the path. But what dangers lurk in there? If you're lucky though, you could just watch Juliette crush your tiny aggressor from there.

1122.content:
At first you stay perfectly still. Maybe they won't notice you. After all, ants track things by scent. At least that's what you've heard. If anything, all they can probably smell is the scent of two regular sized humans that were just there. As you wait and innocently think of what Juliette's feet would smell like at that size, a few of them turn toward you!

They're about your size. Relatively small ants, but still like horses to your one centimetre height. Before long they surround you.

It's pretty terrifying. Their clacking mandibles. Dark unfeeling eyes. What did they want? As images of bugs tearing apart carcasses in time lapse play through your mind, you question, "Do ants do that?" At this size, you were nothing to them though.

One lunges forward and snaps it's pincers right in front of you. The view is horrific and you instantly drop down, crawling along the ground under another ant and planning to scramble away. At their size, it's awkward to try and maneuver around to get you. If anything, dashing under this one saved you.

Standing up and preparing to run however, you stop cold. Looming high above is someone gigantic. With a chill you realize what it's like to be a bug at someone's feet. With your pulse pounding in your ears, you didn't hear the sound of this approaching giantess.

12.content:
Oh, man... this isn't good.

You don't know how, but you've found yourself in a scene straight out of "Honey, I Shrunk the Kids". The grass around you, which you could usually walk through with the greatest of ease, now towers over you like so many crowded street lamps. Their once smooth surfaces have now given way to a mass of thready and coarse fibers, while the ground beneath you is either largely consistent of rocks with all of them bigger than your knee line or gigantic amounts of upturned mud. You really wish, in your petrified fear, that you at least could have shrunk in the house; at least you could have found some meager hospitality in there.

As your amazement continues to give way to sheer terror, you suddenly feel a big vibration in the ground, like a single thump. Then a second, larger one. Then a still larger third. You realize that these are footsteps.... It must be Julia!

Praying that she'll notice you, you crawl up a blade of grass as quickly as you can and gaze in incredulity at Juliette. Saying she's big is an understatement; her height as she's strolling over to where you are is big enough to cover your entire field of vision, in both directions, and she's only getting bigger as she gets closer. She stops about four feet away from you- to you, over a track field's distance away. She then calls for you: "Honey?"

You could try running over to her, or calling out to her. You're certainly not going to just wait around here.
12.title: Juliette comes back
